You
must create a female for

with whom I can live in the

for my
being – ;
This you alone can

I

must not
refuse.
As he said
this
I could no longer suppress
the
anger
that burned within me.
I
do
refuse
it,

replied, &
no torture shall ever
extort a consent from

You may
render me the most miserable of
men

yourself

desolate the

have answer
ed

instead

threatening

man

You

human

Begone;
I cannot

How
inconstant are your

but

with

man
&
dwell,

most savage
of

away &
in my dying

Saying
this

me
fearful perhaps
of any change in
my sentiments. I saw him descend

the flight of
the eagle
and quickly lost
him
among the undulations of the
sea of ice.
His tale had occupied the whole
day
and the sun was upon the
ve verge

to descend to
the
valley
as I should soon be encompassed

But my heart was heavy, and

The dark pines rose

These were wild & miserable

wind

k

It was morning

Chamounix —
but my
presence

strange

family

What could I say to them
or how account for my disappearance
and present miser
The following day we returned to Geneva.
The

But the
medecine

he hastened to return

calm

ferings from

For
myself
I was passive in all
their
arrangements,

Can you

By
